hanzi-su-wiki:
衷

Значения

Внутри; искренность

Мнемоника

Одежда 衣 в середине 中, т.е. бельё. В широком смысле — качества личности, центр поведения — беспристрастность, искренность.
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhōng
inner feelings
внутренние чувства
rtega_mnemonic:
衷衷RSbottom of one's heart, honest, sincere, good and virtuous, goodness, proper, appropriate, befitting, propriety, undergarments
  • in the middle 中 of one's clothes 衤: one's heart which is sincere and good and one's undergarments
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A person in a robe 衣 with his heart 中 marked; 中 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
衷心 [ zhōng xīn ]: heartfelt; wholehearted; cordial
由衷 [ yóu zhōng ]: heartfelt; sincere; unfeigned
热衷 [ rè zhōng ]: to feel strongly about; to be fond of; obsession; deep commitment
初衷 [ chū zhōng ]: original intention
无动于衷 [ wú dòng yú zhōng ]: aloof; indifferent; unconcerned

heisig_chinese_memo: This grief guy shared his innermost feelings with a girl and she rammed a walking stick down his throat.
heisig_story: Between the top hat and the scarf you will see the character for in which is truncated at the bottom so as not to interfere with the scarf. You can think of this character forming as a pair with that of the former frame: there the in (the walking stick in the mouth) was set on its side; here it is set upright.
koohiiStory1: The guy from pathetic (#401) shared his inmost feelings with a girl and she rammed a walking stick down his throat. It ruptured his inmost organs.
koohiiStory2: Besides making money from acting like a dog (see decline), the pathetic man has risked his inmost internal organs by becoming a cane swallower!
jp_example_words: 折衷(せっちゅう): compromise, cross, blending, eclecticism
Ru_Russian: из глубины души, от всего сердца

  • компромиссное предложение, компромисс

  • кн. искренние чувства, искренность, сердечность
    • warodai
    苦衷くちゅう
  • беззаветная преданность делу
  • трудное (тяжёлое, затруднительное) положение
    • warodai
    和衷協同わちゅうきょうどう
  • полное согласие, сотрудничество, тесный контакт
    • warodai
    衷情ちゅうじょう
  • true heart, inner feelings
    • edict2

humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " clothing " and " in ", the original meaning is underwear. "Shuowen": "In the middle of the clothes. From the clothes, the middle voice. The "Chunqiu Biography" says: All are in their hearts." Duan Yucai's note: "The clothes are those who are outside, and those who are in the heart."

" Sincere " can mean wearing it next to the body or inside. "The Nine Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xuan Gong": "Chen Linggong, Kong Ning, and Yi Xing's father communicated with Xia Ji, and they all sincerely convinced them to play in the court."

" Sincere " also means heart. "Twenty-eight years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "To entice his heart today, so that everyone will be willing to follow each other."

" Zhong " also means center and central. "The Second Year of Zuo Zhuan-Min Gong": "Peace, the flag of the heart." Du Yuyan: "The flag is the table, so it shows its center."

" Heart " can also mean interruption. "The Nine Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Yin Gong": "Rong people met the overthrow before, rushed, Zhu Dan chased it, sincerely Rong master, hit it back and forth, and died." Yang Bojun's note: "Benefit from the heart, mean to interrupt. It is said that because of the emergence of three ambushes, the Rong division was broken into several sections."

" Sincere " can also refer to decency. "Zuo Zhuan-Sixth Year of Zhaogong": "Shu Xiang said: "Chu Pi, I Zhong, how can I do what we can do!"" Du's pre-annotation: "Chu, evil, right, right."

" Sincere " also refers to kindness. "Book‧ Tanggao": "Only the emperor, God, surrender to the people." Kong Chuan: "Heart, kindness."

" Sincere " is also called loyalty. "Xunzi ‧ Zidao": "A filial son does not obey his fate, it is the heart."

" Sincere " can also be appropriate. "The Twenty-four Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "If you are not satisfied, your body will be disaster." Du's note: "The heart is still suitable."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " clothing " and " in ", the original meaning is underwear.
humanum_full_description:
從「衣」，「中」聲，本義為貼身內衣。《說文》：「裏褻衣。从衣，中聲。《春秋傳》曰：皆衷其衵服。」 段玉裁注：「褻衣，有在外者，衷則在內者也。」

　　「衷」可表示貼身穿、穿在裡面。《左傳‧宣公九年》：「陳靈公與孔寧、儀行父通於夏姬，皆衷其衵服，以戲于朝。」

　　「衷」也表示內心。《左傳‧僖公二十八年》：「今天誘其衷，使皆降心以相從也。」

　　「衷」還表示中心、中央。《左傳‧閔公二年》：「佩，衷之旗也。」杜預注：「旗，表也，所以表明其中心。」

　　「衷」亦可表示中斷。《左傳‧隱公九年》：「戎人之前遇覆者，奔，祝聃逐之，衷戎師，前後擊之，盡殪。」楊伯峻注：「衷借為中，中斷之意。此謂因三處伏兵突起，將戎師折為數段。」

　　「衷」也可指正派。《左傳‧昭公六年》：「叔向曰：『楚辟，我衷，若何效辟！』」杜預注：「辟，邪也；衷，正也。」

　　「衷」還指善。《書‧湯誥》：「惟皇上帝，降衷于下民。」孔傳：「衷，善也。」

　　「衷」亦謂忠誠。《荀子‧子道》：「孝子不從命，乃衷。」

　　「衷」還能表示恰當。《左傳‧僖公二十四年》：「服之不衷，身之災也。」杜預注：「衷，猶適也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「衣」，「中」聲，本義為貼身內衣。

折衷(せっちゅう): compromise, cross, blending, eclecticism

從「 衣 」，「 中 」聲，本義為貼身內衣。《說文》：「裏褻衣。从衣，中聲。《春秋傳》曰：皆衷其衵服。」 段玉裁注：「褻衣，有在外者，衷則在內者也。」 「 衷 」可表示貼身穿、穿在裡面。《左傳‧宣公九年》：「陳靈公與孔寧、儀行父通於夏姬，皆衷其衵服，以戲于朝。」 「 衷 」也表示內心。《左傳‧僖公二十八年》：「今天誘其衷，使皆降心以相從也。」 「 衷 」還表示中心、中央。《左傳‧閔公二年》：「佩，衷之旗也。」杜預注：「旗，表也，所以表明其中心。」 「 衷 」亦可表示中斷。《左傳‧隱公九年》：「戎人之前遇覆者，奔，祝聃逐之，衷戎師，前後擊之，盡殪。」楊伯峻注：「衷借為中，中斷之意。此謂因三處伏兵突起，將戎師折為數段。」 「 衷 」也可指正派。《左傳‧昭公六年》：「叔向曰：『楚辟，我衷，若何效辟！』」杜預注：「辟，邪也；衷，正也。」 「 衷 」還指善。《書‧湯誥》：「惟皇上帝，降衷于下民。」孔傳：「衷，善也。」 「 衷 」亦謂忠誠。《荀子‧子道》：「孝子不從命，乃衷。」 「 衷 」還能表示恰當。《左傳‧僖公二十四年》：「服之不衷，身之災也。」杜預注：「衷，猶適也。」
From the sound of " clothing" and " in", the original meaning is underwear. "Shuowen": "In the middle of the clothes. From the clothes, the middle voice. The "Chunqiu Biography" says: All are in their hearts." Duan Yucai's note: "The clothes are those who are outside, and those who are in the heart." " Sincere" can mean wearing it next to the body or inside. "The Nine Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xuan Gong": "Chen Linggong, Kong Ning, and Yi Xing's father communicated with Xia Ji, and they all sincerely convinced them to play in the court." " Sincere" also means heart. "Twenty-eight years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "To entice his heart today, so that everyone will be willing to follow each other." " Zhong" also means center and central. "The Second Year of Zuo Zhuan-Min Gong": "Peace, the flag of the heart." Du Yuyan: "The flag is the table, so it shows its center." " Heart" can also mean interruption. "The Nine Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Yin Gong": "Rong people met the overthrow before, rushed, Zhu Dan chased it, sincerely Rong master, hit it back and forth, and died." Yang Bojun's note: "Benefit from the heart, mean to interrupt. It is said that because of the emergence of three ambushes, the Rong division was broken into several sections." " Sincere" can also refer to decency. "Zuo Zhuan-Sixth Year of Zhaogong": "Shu Xiang said: "Chu Pi, I Zhong, how can I do what we can do!"" Du's pre-annotation: "Chu, evil, right, right." " Sincere" also refers to kindness. "Book‧ Tanggao": "Only the emperor, God, surrender to the people." Kong Chuan: "Heart, kindness." " Sincere" is also called loyalty. "Xunzi ‧ Zidao": "A filial son does not obey his fate, it is the heart." " Sincere" can also be appropriate. "The Twenty-four Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "If you are not satisfied, your body will be disaster." Du's note: "The heart is still suitable."

衷字的基本解释

衷
zhōng
内心：由衷。苦衷。无动于衷。衷肠。
福，善：“降衷于下民”。
正中不偏：折衷。
贴身的内衣。

衷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhōng］
［《廣韻》陟弓切，平東，知。］
(1)贴身内衣。
(2)谓贴身穿着；穿在里面。
(3)引申为藏在里面。
(4)内心。
(5)中心，中央。
(6)中途。
(7)中断。
(8)折中；裁断。
(9)正，正派。
(10)善。
(11)忠诚。
(12)通“盅”。
(13)姓。南唐有衷愉，见《正字通》。
[②]［zhòng］
［《廣韻》陟仲切，去送，知。］
［《廣韻》陟弓切，平東，知。］
适当，恰当。

衷字的英文翻译

◎ 衷
heart, inner feelings

衷字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　衷； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1112第28
【唐韻】陟弓切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】陟隆切，?音中。【玉篇】善也。【書·湯誥】惟皇上帝，降衷于下民。【左傳·昭二十二年】無亢不衷，以獎亂人。　又中也。【周語】國之將興，其君齊明衷正，精潔惠和。　又【韻會】誠也。【左傳·昭十六年】發命之不衷。　又通也。【左傳·莊六年】必度于本末而後立衷焉。　又【增韻】方寸所蘊也。　又【說文】裏褻衣也。【左傳·宣九年】陳靈公與孔寧儀行父通于夏姬，皆衷其衵服。　又姓。【正字通】漢哀帝之後衷愉仕唐，攺姓哀。　又【廣韻】陟仲切，中去聲。當也。【韻會】折衷，平也。【史記·孔子世家】折衷于夫子。【註】折，斷也。衷，當也。　又【後漢·梁統傳】爰制百姓于?之衷。【衷】不輕不重也。通作中。【前漢·貢禹傳】微夫子之言，則無所折中。亦讀作平聲。　【六書正譌】俗作?，非。

考證：〔【後漢·梁統傳】爰制百姓于冊之衷。【註】不輕不重也。〕　謹照原文冊改?。不輕不重也卽原傳正文非註文。註字改衷字。
衷字的源字形

衷字的起名意思

意为衷心、善良。

Basic explanation of words
Sincere
zhōng
Inner Heart: Sincerely. Hardship. Indifferent. Heartfelt.
Good luck, goodness: "giving up one's heart to the people".
Right in the middle: compromise.
Close-fitting underwear.
Sincere
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhōng］
["Guangyun" Zhi bow cut, Pingdong, Zhi. ]
(1) Underwear.
(2) It means wearing close-fitting; wearing inside.
(3) The extension is to hide inside.
(4) Inside.
(5) Center, center.
(6) Halfway.
(7) Interrupt.
(8) Compromise; Adjudication.
(9) Being upright and decent.
(10) Goodness.
(11) Loyalty.
(12) Through "cup".
(13) Last name. Southern Tang has a heartfelt pleasure, see "Zhengzitong".
[②]［zhòng］
["Guangyun" Zhizhong cut, go to send, know. ]
["Guangyun" Zhi bow cut, Pingdong, Zhi. ]
Appropriate, appropriate.

衣子俘条
衷
会意字。从衣(衣服)、从中(里面),表示衷是穿在里面的衣服;中(zhong )兼表声。本义是内衣。引申指内心。

Цунги (одежда) и Цунчжун (внутри) указывают на одежду, которую носят внутри; Чжун (чжун) также выражает голос.
Первоначальное значение - нижнее белье.
Расширение относится к сердцу.
Внутреннее сердце: ~ Привязанность "От ~" Безразличие к ~.
~ Кишечник ~ Цюй ~ Начало сердца ~ и ~ горький ~ скрытый ~ ты ~
Сложите ~ и ~ помогите друг другу ~ Я ничего не могу с собой поделать ~
Тщеславный
писец
Кай
zhōng, zhòng
I zhōng сущ.
1) середина, центр
裁其衷 разрезать посередине (в знач.: прийти к компромиссному решению)
2) чувства; мысли; душа, сердце; сокровенное, заветное
诱其衷 выведать его мысли
言不由衷 слова идут не от сердца (не из души); неискренний, неоткровенный
深衷 глубокие чувства, глубина души
阔衷 открыть сердце, распахнуть душу
3) * добро, благодеяние
降衷于下民 ниспослать народу добро
II zhōng прил./наречие
идущий от сердца, чистосердечный, искренний; правильный, надлежащий; чистосердечно, искренне, от самого сердца
辟衷 коварный и искренний (прямой)
衷对 чистосердечно ответить
III гл.
1) zhōng * надеть (поддеть) под платье
衷其衵服 надеть на себя её (женскую) исподнюю одежду
2) zhòng подходить, соответствовать, отвечать требованиям
服之不衷, 身之灾也 если одежда не соответствует положению,- это несчастье для человека
IV собств.
Чжун (фамилия)
